name: 2023 11th International Conference on Intelligent Computing and Wireless Optical Communications
content: Publication: Submitted paper will be peer reviewed by conference committees. Accepted papers will be included in ICWOC 2023 Conference Proceedings, which will be archived in IEEE Xplore , and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and other indexing services. Selected papers of ICWOC 2023 will be recommended to be published into Journal of Communications (JCM). ICWOC 2023 in IEEE conference calendar: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/57905
